## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                                      | Type  | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----- | ----------- |
| `default` | `default` | default tab to be selected on tabs load when not selected first will be selected | `any` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event        | Description | Type               |
| ------------ | ----------- | ------------------ |
